profile_management.description: Enables a menu entry to do user profile management and open guest windows

razer_chroma_support.description: Enables Razer Chroma color device integration (on Windows). Requires a restart of Vivaldi to be active.

double_click_menu.friendly_name: Show context menu on a double click
double_click_menu.description: Use a double click anywhere in the page to show its context menu. Requires a restart of Vivaldi to be active.

css_mods.description: Allow for CSS modifications set in appearance in settings.

glorified_find_in_page_results.description: Added some shine to the find in page results.

install_pwa.friendly_name: Menu entries for installing Progressive Web Apps.
install_pwa.description: Enables menu entries to do installation of Progressive Web Apps.
